name: Something is going wrong!
description:
Something is going wrong, the game of the year!

Start an incredible adventure figuring from where are coming all these bugs, and who's the nasty creature behind this!

Developed under Gen7 Engine, the first visual programming and 3D Engine for PSP. The game will soon be released on Github so you can take a look inside of it! 
Support Gen7 -> https://opencollective.com/gen7-engine

Screens:

Notice:
Some PSPs may crash after finding the ghost and going to the boss through the top door. Please boot the boss version (EBOOT) to play the boss instead. Thanks!
Maybe I'll use the gamejam prize to buy a PSP and do my own testing :)
